meanings.sent1: She adulated her favorite singer by attending all his concerts.
meanings.sent2: The fans adulated the actor after his outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The adulated chef received so many compliments that he blushed.
meanings.sent4: Her adulated artwork shone brightly among the other pieces in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The adulated student's hard work was recognized by everyone in the school.

meanings.definition: To show excessive admiration or devotion to someone
meanings.sent1: He adulated his mentor by following all his advice.
meanings.sent2: The princess was adulated by her loyal subjects.
meanings.sent3: The adulated pet dog was treated like royalty by its owner.
meanings.sent4: The adulated leader inspired unwavering loyalty from his followers.
meanings.sent5: The adulated athlete's determination was admired by all who knew him.
